scenes.description: Ouro Kronii performs the song 'Idol' (アイドル) by YOASOBI on a 3D stage.
MC section. Ouro Kronii welcomes viewers to her 3D showcase, introduces her custom stage, and interacts with the 'audience'.
Introduction to the 'Cronie Awards' segment, featuring a grand award ceremony setting.

subtitles.original: アイドル
subtitles.english: Idol

subtitles.original: #3Dronii
subtitles.english: #3Dronii

subtitles.original: これこそは私なりの愛だ
subtitles.english: This is my own kind of love

subtitles.original: 流れる汗もきれいなアクア
subtitles.english: Even the flowing sweat is beautiful aqua

subtitles.original: ルビーを隠したこの瞼
subtitles.english: These eyelids that hide rubies

subtitles.original: 歌い踊り舞う私はマリア
subtitles.english: Singing and dancing, I am Mary

subtitles.original: そう、嘘はとびきりの愛だ
subtitles.english: Yes, lies are an extraordinary kind of love

subtitles.original: 誰かに愛されたことも
subtitles.english: Having been loved by someone

subtitles.original: 誰かのこと愛したこともない
subtitles.english: Or having loved someone—I've never done either

subtitles.original: そんな私の嘘がいつか本当になること信じてる
subtitles.english: I believe that such lies of mine will one day come true

subtitles.original: いつかきっと全部手に入れる
subtitles.english: One day, I'll surely have it all

subtitles.original: 私はそう欲張りなアイドル
subtitles.english: That's because I'm a greedy idol

subtitles.original: 等身大でみんなのことちゃんと愛したいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to love everyone properly as my true self

subtitles.original: 今日も嘘をつくの この言葉がいつか本当になる日を願って
subtitles.english: I lie today as well, wishing for the day these words will come true

subtitles.original: それでもまだ君と君にだけは言えずにいたけど
subtitles.english: Even so, I still haven't been able to say it only to you

subtitles.original: あ、やっと言えた これは絶対嘘じゃない
subtitles.english: Ah, I finally said it. This is definitely not a lie

subtitles.original: 愛してる
subtitles.english: I love you

subtitles.original: Hey! Kronichiwa!
subtitles.english: Hey! Kronichiwa!

subtitles.original: Oh! Whew!
subtitles.english: Oh! Whew!

subtitles.original: We did it. I hope that was good.
subtitles.english: We did it. I hope that was good.

subtitles.original: And, well, I hope I looked like
subtitles.english: And, well, I hope I looked like

subtitles.original: an idol on stage.
subtitles.english: an idol on stage.

subtitles.original: And if you liked the performance so far,
subtitles.english: And if you liked the performance so far,

subtitles.original: be sure to use the hashtag #3Dronii.
subtitles.english: be sure to use the hashtag #3Dronii.

subtitles.original: And, well, speaking of the stage, take a look at this!
subtitles.english: And, well, speaking of the stage, take a look at this!

subtitles.original: Ah, it's so beautiful.
subtitles.english: Ah, it's so beautiful.

subtitles.original: And it's like the stage was, like, made for me,
subtitles.english: And it's like the stage was, like, made for me,

subtitles.original: and only me.
subtitles.english: and only me.

subtitles.original: Look at just how grand it is.
subtitles.english: Look at just how grand it is.

subtitles.original: And, well, whew!
subtitles.english: And, well, whew!

subtitles.original: Yeah, it's looking a little too bright right now,
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's looking a little too bright right now,

subtitles.original: so shall we turn it down a bit?
subtitles.english: so shall we turn it down a bit?

subtitles.original: Whew! Okay, that is much better.
subtitles.english: Whew! Okay, that is much better.

subtitles.original: Ooh! Oh yeah,
subtitles.english: Ooh! Oh yeah,

subtitles.original: I guess I forgot to tell you...
subtitles.english: I guess I forgot to tell you...

subtitles.original: ...this, um, can change from daytime to nighttime.
subtitles.english: ...this, um, can change from daytime to nighttime.

subtitles.original: I can control the time of day according to my will.
subtitles.english: I can control the time of day according to my will.

subtitles.original: Oh wait! Hey!
subtitles.english: Oh wait! Hey!

subtitles.original: Wait, wait, wait. Look at you. Wait, you got invited? What?
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, wait. Look at you. Wait, you got invited? What?

subtitles.original: How many supers did you have to pay to get that VIP seat?
subtitles.english: How many supers did you have to pay to get that VIP seat?

subtitles.original: Wait, and you? Wait!
subtitles.english: Wait, and you? Wait!

subtitles.original: Get out of here! I didn't invite you.
subtitles.english: Get out of here! I didn't invite you.

subtitles.original: Ah, whatever. But, oh yeah,
subtitles.english: Ah, whatever. But, oh yeah,

subtitles.original: how'd you think about the song?
subtitles.english: how'd you think about the song?

subtitles.original: Um, I know it's pretty overdone,
subtitles.english: Um, I know it's pretty overdone,

subtitles.original: but I thought it was pretty fitting
subtitles.english: but I thought it was pretty fitting

subtitles.original: for this show today, don't you think?
subtitles.english: for this show today, don't you think?

subtitles.original: But, yeah. It's a pretty good start for today.
subtitles.english: But, yeah. It's a pretty good start for today.

subtitles.original: But it doesn't stop there.
subtitles.english: But it doesn't stop there.

subtitles.original: Because stay tuned, the first ever
subtitles.english: Because stay tuned, the first ever

subtitles.original: Cronie Awards is happening right now.
subtitles.english: Cronie Awards is happening right now.

subtitles.original: Today, tonight, with all of you and all of me.
subtitles.english: Today, tonight, with all of you and all of me.

subtitles.original: What does that mean?
subtitles.english: What does that mean?

subtitles.original: Well, you've gotta stick around for that.
subtitles.english: Well, you've gotta stick around for that.

subtitles.original: All right, let's get this show on the road.
subtitles.english: All right, let's get this show on the road.

subtitles.original: Take a look at this!
subtitles.english: Take a look at this!

subtitles.original: Ladies and gentlemen...
subtitles.english: Ladies and gentlemen...

subtitles.original: ...welcome to the Cronie Awards!
subtitles.english: ...welcome to the Cronie Awards!

subtitles.original: Today, we'll be joined by not one, not two...
subtitles.english: Today, we'll be joined by not one, not two...

subtitles.original: ...not even three, but four different Kroniis.
subtitles.english: ...not even three, but four different Kroniis.

subtitles.original: That's right! And each Kronii will display
subtitles.english: That's right! And each Kronii will display

subtitles.original: their amazing talents...
subtitles.english: their amazing talents...

subtitles.original: ...and the best one will receive the award
subtitles.english: ...and the best one will receive the award

subtitles.original: in this ceremony.
subtitles.english: in this ceremony.
